h2_title: Black Myth: Wukong Mind Core Locations
content: You will need to obtain the Loong Scales from Chapter 2 - Yellow Wind Ridge before you are able to access the secret area behind the sand waterfall. This will require you to defeat the King of Flowing Sands and Second Rat Prince and First Prince of Flowing Sands. The video guide below will take you through how to obtain the Loong Scales.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Mind_Core.md', within the main section titled 'Mind Core', specifically from the subsection 'Black Myth: Wukong Mind Core Locations' and the sub-subsection 'Mind Core Location 7'.
The content is as follows:
You will need to obtain the Loong Scales from Chapter 2 - Yellow Wind Ridge before you are able to access the secret area behind the sand waterfall. This will require you to defeat the King of Flowing Sands and Second Rat Prince and First Prince of Flowing Sands. The video guide below will take you through how to obtain the Loong Scales.
